nodes.text: Fallaxen was a male Kadas'sa'Nikto who participated in the Grand Acquisitions Race held by the Chevin Conglomerate, but was killed on Nar Shaddaa.

Fallaxen appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as an enemy in the Imperial mission "A Questionable Motive," part of the Grand Acquisitions Race World Event. The event was only held for a limited time, and has not been repeated since.
